# allowCrossing

**Type Property**

An option that enables the crossing feature.

## Declaration

```swift
static let allowCrossing: PortalComponent.Options
```

## Discussion

Objects within the portal world with a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalCrossingComponent] can cross the portal when the `allowCrossing` option is in an enabled state. Crossing behavior is based on the user-defined geometry for [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/crossingMode-swift.property].
